subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Miami say a fifth person has been charged in the slaying of the Redskins’ Sean Taylor. Ed Griffith, a spokesman for the Miami-Dade County State Attorney’s office, said that 16-year-old Timothy Brown was charged with first-degree murder. Taylor died of blood loss in November after he was shot at his Miami-area home during what the police said was a botched robbery.
